short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that makes the experience of using uddata+ better

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UD++ is an extension which enhances the use of the web platform Uddata+.

Features in the current version:

 - Colour theming
 - Custom colour themes
 - Homework marking
 - Hide unwanted lessons
 - Sort assignments
 - Hide finished assignments automatically
 - Notify when EASY-A is scheduled to go down
 - Show a cached version of the schedule on the downtime page


More features to come in the future

Source code:
https://github.com/Benjadahl/UDPlus-Plus
